title: I think Riot needs some new people on the rework team
body:
Assassin rework - failed
Malzahar rework - failed
Fiora rework - failed
Aatrox minirework - failed
Kog rework was reverted
Ryze is on his 3rd incarnation and now he's been gutted again sitting at 38% winrate
Skarner is picked even less after being too strong and nerfed 

All of these ended with huge nerfs after a patch or two of being pick or ban. So far the only ones I see being healthy are Poppy and Yorick. I want to say Talon and  Fiddle but those were only changes to 2 skills each. Riot, you gotta stop trying to make everyone some unique thing. Some champs can fill the same roles and be better in some fields than others. We don't need a hip new unique tank buster that does massive true damage with an aoe heal ({{champion:114}}) or a "versatile" burst mage with utility in the forms of a snare, a shield, a speed buff, and an aoe TF ult for his team ({{champion:13}}).

* Darius' rework made him less healthy.  The heal made him more frustrating to play against and they funneled a lot of his damage into his new 5-stacks bloodrage passive.
* Graves' rework wasn't "successful," considering he was perfectly fine and highly viable as an adc already.  It ripped him out of the adc role and turned him into an overtuned jungler that has been a balancing nightmare.
* Vel'Koz is still just a poke support.
* Veigar was only "successful" in the fact that they returned the power he lost when he was GUTTED as "compensation" for DFG being removed from the game.
* Mage Rework was a failure, I've never known anyone to claim otherwise.
* Sona rework was literally a list of over 30 simultaneous nerfs.  It was sooo bad, Fearless intentionally hid the kit's numbers from the patch notes, the champ update news and even her champ page for the entire 2 years until 6.14.  Patch 4.13 made Sona the weakest support in the game & she's still considered a troll pick to this day.
* Season 5 jungle rework, probably the biggest travesty this game has ever seen.  Fearless made jungling so impossible, barely 2 or 3 champs in the entire game could even perform the role.  It took constant tweaks, nerfs and buffs throughout the entire season to undo that shit.
* Season 6 jungle rework, massive failure.  Rito undid all of the previous year's worth of effort fixing the jungle and only to allow Fearless to pull the exact same shit all over again and it took months to fix this time.
* Meddler stated last week that all class reworks have been failures.  Every single one has created more issues than they solved.
* Fearless also worked on the juggernaut update, which Meddler specifically called a failure.

Notice how Fearless has been involved with a large number of these failures.  You won't find his name on a single successful rework.
